name: Hexagon: One Room
description:
Collect three keys and escape the room!

Play with your friend and choose one role:

As Explorer you will look for keys with the help of a Librarian.

Solf Puzzles and do not look at your partner's screen.

Game based on We Were Here series.

(this game haven't matchmaking you with your friends should only download and choose another role, it's no rng  game)
